Factsheet

Developer:
New Hell Studios
Based in Brooklyn, NYC
Release date:
Early 2022

Steam
Itch
Website:
rozeblud.com
Regular Price:
TBD

Request Press Copy

Description

Roze Blud is Tactical Squad Deathmath coming soon from New Hell Studios. Druidic eco-warriors (Roze Blud) defend the homeland vs USA imperial death squad (NEED)

History

In Development since Summer 2018.

Features

  • Deathmatch
  • Tactical Gameplay
  • Retro Digitized Sprites from Real Actors
  • Dynamic Lighting with Stealth gameplay in the Shadows
  • Dual-Monitor support - No Screen Peeking!

About New Hell Studios

Boilerplate
New Hell Studios is a game studio out of Brooklyn. Drew K. runs the show and collaborates with his friends.
